summary: The daughter of a politically disgraced university professor struggles to find a place for herself in love and life, in the uncertain world of Japan leading into WWII.
cast: Setsuko Hara|Susumu Fujita|Denjirô Ôkôchi|Haruko Sugimura|Eiko Miyoshi|Kokuten Kôdô|Akitake Kôno|Takashi Shimura|Taizô Fukami|Masao Shimizu|Haruo Tanaka|Kazu Hikari|Hisako Hara|Shin Takemura|Tateo Kawasaki|Fusako Fujima|Sayuri Tanima|Itoko Kôno|Chieko Nakakita|Ichirô Chiba|Isamu Yonekura|Noburo Takagi|Hiroshi Sano
title: No añoro mi juventud
